comment._content: My Great grand dad was in a Queensland  contingent  that went to the Boer war.John Wright from Texas.

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/82934060@N05] We are just about to bring online an index of photographs from the newspaper of Quenslanders who fought in the Boer War. You may just find a photo of him there. We'll let you know when the index is live.
